Functions
init_snek
init_snek:
Brief

Initialize snek with SNEK_INITIAL_SIZE

Params
x0

snek base address

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

snek_push
snek_push:
Brief

Push a coord pair into the snek

Params
x0

snek base address

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

Notes

The size of the snek should be less than its capacity

snek_pop
snek_pop:
Brief

Pop a coord pair from the snek

Params
x0

snek base address

Notes

The snek array should not be empty

snek_head
snek_head:
Brief

Params
x0

snek base address

Return
x1

x pos

x2

y pos

snek_last
snek_last:
Brief

Return the 'tail' pair of the snek queue

Params
x0

snek base address

Return
x1

x pos

x2

y pos

snek_is_ded
snek_is_ded:
Brief

Check if the snek is ded

Params
x0

snek base address

Returns
x0

1 if true | 0 if false

draw_snek
draw_snek:
Brief

Draw a snek on the screen

Params
x0

framebuffer

x1

snek base address
